card.name: First General of the Wards
card.text: Vigilance Other Dwarves you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of a permanent, create two 1/1 white Dwarf creature tokens.

card.name: Wakeborne Kraken
card.text: Whenever Wakeborne Kraken or another Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent you control enters, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand. Whenever a creature an opponent controls leaves the battlefield, if it didn't die, draw a card.

card.name: Isles Uncharted
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At any time during that turn, you may search your opponents' libraries for a card and exile it, then shuffle that player's library. You may cast that card from exile, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it. If you don't, shuffle that card into its owner's library. Exile Isles Uncharted.

card.name: Crain's Crony
card.text: Whenever Crain's Crony enters or attacks, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value. At the beginning of each end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you lose the game.

card.name: Inexorable Epidemic
card.text: Enchant opponent Creatures enchanted player controls get -2/-2. Whenever enchanted player casts a noncreature spell, they lose 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Captain Darlene Filham
card.text: First strike, haste Play with the top card of your library revealed. {1}{R}: Darlene gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Darlene deals damage to a player, if the top card of your library has mana value equal to the damage dealt, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Giradrus, Ashen Master
card.text: Flying Whenever Giradrus enters or attacks, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a Dragon card from among them onto the battlefield. If Giradrus is attacking, that Dragon enters tapped and attacking. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Crewmaster Gillo
card.text: When Gillo enters, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. As long as you control five or more creatures with different names, creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

card.name: Blighted Branch-Beast
card.text: Trample {1}{G}: Put an overgrowth counter on target creature you control. As long as it has an overgrowth counter on it, it has base power and toughness 8/8.

card.name: Gos, Knotweald Elder
card.text: Vigilance, trample Each creature you control can't have power less than its toughness. (If it would have less, it has as much as its toughness instead.) Each creature your opponents control can't have toughness greater than its power.

card.name: Two-Faced Marauder
card.text: Creatures you control dying cause abilities of that creature to trigger as though that creature entered. {2}{W}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: H.S.S. Demeter
card.text: Whenever H.S.S. Demeter becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature. Whenever H.S.S. Demeter deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: High Sovereign Thura
card.text: Lifelink Triggered abilities of creatures you control that would trigger only when that creature enters instead trigger whenever you gain life for the first time each turn.

card.name: Gale Mediator
card.text: Flying Whenever a player casts a spell, if it isn't that player's main phase, each of their opponents may draw a card.

card.name: East Ward Champion
card.text: Vigilance Resolute — Whenever East Ward Champion attacks, attacking creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn if East Ward Champion's power is greater than its base power.

card.name: Empyrean Griffin
card.text: Flying Whenever Empyrean Griffin attacks, up to one target creature voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.) Permanents your opponents control can't phase in.

card.name: Another Day in Paradise
card.text: Search your library for up to ten land cards, reveal them, and shuffle them into a new face-down library.

card.name: Pick Up the Pieces
card.text: Return X target creature cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, then choose one of them and exile the rest.

card.name: Crown of the Speaker
Mable of the Sea's Whimsy
card.text: Flash When Mable enters, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

card.name: Tabia of the Lionheart
card.text: Lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 3 life. If you do, exile another target nonland permanent until Tabia leaves the battlefield. If you control another permanent that shares a card type with it, exile it instead.

card.name: Harbinger of Giradrus
card.text: {U}, Give yourself a lore counter: Scry 1. This ability costs {2} more to activate for each lore counter you have. {6}{U}, Remove three lore counters from yourself, Sacrifice Harbinger of Giradrus: Draw seven cards, then create two 4/4 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Master Negotiator
card.text: When Master Negotiator enters, you may gain control of target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less. If you do, its controller may draw a card. Otherwise, you draw a card.

card.name: Opaline Drake
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, up to one other target creature you control voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.) Whenever a creature you control phases in, you may have it become a copy of target creature you control until end of turn.

card.name: Last Passage
card.text: Forebode three times, then untap each Omen you control. Until end of turn, if you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. (Create three tapped colorless Omen artifact tokens with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Visions of Oblivion
card.text: You may cast up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Roll the Dice
card.text: Target opponent looks at the top six cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Choose a pile, then play any number of cards from it without paying their mana costs. Put the rest of the cards into your graveyard.

card.name: Sleepless Vigil
card.text: Enchant opponent Whenever you attack enchanted player, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is one plus the number of attacking creatures you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Searle of the Tempest
card.text: Hexproof Whenever a permanent you don't control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.

card.name: Garth of the Chimera
card.text: Prowess Whenever Garth attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Heinous Smuggler
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with two or more black mana symbols in its mana cost, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Dusk Lieutenant
card.text: When Dusk Lieutenant enters, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Once each turn, when you discard a card during your turn, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Orodu, the Onyx Wave
card.text: Trample Orodu, the Onyx Wave can't block. Whenever Orodu attacks, defending player may sacrifice a creature. If they do, prevent all combat damage Orodu would deal this turn.

card.name: Dreadbearer
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life, discards a card, and sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Fair Trial
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker with mana value 4 or less.

card.name: Grasp of Hollows
card.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 5/5 black Horror.

card.name: Mark of Dark Opulence
card.text: Enchant opponent Whenever enchanted player searches their library, you may search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Hugo of the Shadowstaff
card.text: Menace Once each turn, when one or more sources you control deal damage, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hugo.

card.name: Marisa of the Gravehowl
card.text: Deathtouch When Marisa enters, if it was cast, you may put target permanent card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Salty Swab
card.text: When Salty Swab enters, exile the top three cards of your library. Resolute — You may play cards exiled with Salty Swab as long as Salty Swab's power is greater than its base power.

card.name: Ruinous Proselyte
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Ruinous Proselyte: Destroy target artifact or nonbasic land.

card.name: Intrepid Captain
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature token with haste. That token attacks this combat if able. Whenever Intrepid Captain attacks, other attacking Pirates you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Adoroth, the Baneful
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Adoroth, the Baneful attacks, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {1}{R}{R}: Adoroth, the Baneful deals 4 damage to any target. Activate only if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Light the Fuse
card.text: Light the Fuse deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Whenever a permanent dealt damage by Light the Fuse this turn dies this turn, repeat that process.

card.name: Pay the Right Price
card.text: Gain control of up to two target creatures or planeswalkers until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn. Pay the Right Price deals 3 damage to each of them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Dwarven War Hatchet
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike. Equip {2}{R} Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) When Dwarven War Hatchet enters, if you cast it for its madness cost, attach it to target creature you control.

card.name: Alvarez of the Huntsman
card.text: Trample {1}, Discard a land card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Alvarez. He deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Harriet of the Pioneer
card.text: Haste {R}{W}, {T}: You may put a Vehicle card from your hand onto the battlefield. That Vehicle gains haste and becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Cryptozoologist
card.text: {2}{G}: Cryptozoologist voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.) Whenever Cryptozoologist phases in, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield until Cryptozoologist leaves the battlefield. (It returns to your hand if it's still on the battlefield.)

card.name: Children of Gos
card.text: {1}{G}, Discard a card: Target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature. It's still a land. Exile the top card of your library face down. Whenever a land creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a card exiled with Children of Gos into your hand.

card.name: Knotweald Ambassador
card.text: Whenever Knotweald Ambassador becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, choose one — • Knotweald Ambassador deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker that player controls. • Draw a card.

card.name: Helicos Gargantua
card.text: Trample Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Helicos Gargantua's power is greater than its base power, double its power until end of turn.

card.name: Pelagic Hydra
card.text: Pelagic Hydra enters with seven +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pelagic Hydra. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pelagic Hydra: It deals 1 damage to target creature blocking or blocked by it.

card.name: Exotic Discovery
card.text: Madness {4}{G}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) Look at the top eight cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then if this spell was cast for its madness cost, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Trawl the Wreckage
card.text: For each permanent type, return up to one target card of that type from your graveyard to your hand. (The permanent types are artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker.)

card.name: Valencia of the Concordant
card.text: First strike Each spell your opponents cast that would cost less than three mana to cast costs {1} more to cast.

card.name: Holcomb of the Peregrine
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you cast a spell with the same name as a card in your graveyard, draw a card.

card.name: The Winged Steed
card.text: Whenever The Winged Steed attacks, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Brig of the Damned
card.text: Deathtouch When Brig of the Damned enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card's mana value is 2, you may return it to the battlefield instead. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Sun-Crowned Flagship
card.text: {2}: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Sun-Crowned Flagship attacks, each attacking creature you control gains trample until end of turn. Crew 7 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 7 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Culling Blade
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, they sacrifice two permanents. Equip—{2}, Sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Blacksteel Loadout
card.text: Equipped creature gets +4/+2 and has first strike, vigilance, and trample. Equip {3}

card.name: Slaughterkeg
card.text: Slaughterkeg can't attack or block. While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least Slaughterkeg if able. When Slaughterkeg dies, draw a card.

card.name: Dragonlord's Shrine
card.text: Each creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) {T}, Discard a card: Dragonlord's Shrine deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Pirate's Hideout
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if a creature died this turn.

card.name: East Ward Halberdier
card.text: Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, East Ward Halberdier gains double strike until end of turn if its power is greater than its base power.

card.name: Battle Rallier
card.text: {W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Pale Courier
card.text: Flying Whenever Pale Courier deals combat damage to a player, it voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.) Whenever Pale Courier phases in, create a 1/1 white Dwarf creature token.

card.name: Watchful Navigator
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Watchful Navigator crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Ironclad Infantry
card.text: First strike Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ironclad Infantry.

card.name: Skywise Emissary
card.text: Flying As long as you control exactly one other creature, that creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Vivid Griffin
card.text: Flying Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, Vivid Griffin gains lifelink until end of turn if its power is greater than its base power.

card.name: Fight Song
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Forged Alliance
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 until end of turn. Put a first strike counter on each of them.

card.name: Autointerment
card.text: Exile target tapped creature. Its controller gains 3 life.

card.name: All That Glitters
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

card.name: Pathless Shallows
card.text: Enchant opponent When Pathless Shallows enters, exile target creature enchanted player controls until Pathless Shallows leaves the battlefield. Enchanted player can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

card.name: Crosswind Cutter
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Crosswind Cutter if it's a creature. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Fated Mariner
card.text: Whenever Fated Mariner attacks, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {1}{U}: Fated Mariner can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Shoal Raker
card.text: Flying When Shoal Raker enters, draw a card if an opponent is cursed.

card.name: Elder Prophesier
card.text: When Elder Prophesier enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Curse card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Twilight Privateer
card.text: {1}{U}: Twilight Privateer voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.) Whenever Twilight Privateer phases in, up to one other target creature voyages.

card.name: Raving Brigand
card.text: When Raving Brigand enters, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice an Omen, target player mills three cards.

card.name: Salvage Wyvern
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Armada Envoy
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control phases in, it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Dissolve
card.text: Counter target spell. Scry 1.

card.name: Captain's Orders
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control two or more Pirates. Draw three cards.

card.name: Calamitous Wave
card.text: Return up to two target creatures and/or artifacts to their owners' hands. For each permanent returned to its owner's hand this way, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Deathless Conscription
card.text: Enchant creature When Deathless Conscription enters, untap enchanted creature. You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Gaze of the Grave
card.text: Enchant opponent Enchanted player plays with the top card of their library revealed. Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, you may have them mill a card.

card.name: Thalassophobia
card.text: Enchant opponent Whenever enchanted player draws a card or casts a spell, put a foreshadow counter on Thalassophobia. Remove eight foreshadow counters from Thalassophobia and sacrifice it: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token.

card.name: Legion of Giradrus
card.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token. {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Skeleton you control.

card.name: Merciless Bandit
card.text: Whenever Merciless Bandit or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Fen Glutton
card.text: Menace As long as you control exactly one other creature, that creature gets +1/+1 and has menace.

card.name: Grave Wrangler
card.text: When Grave Wrangler enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Faithless Deserter
card.text: When Faithless Deserter enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Stygian Leviathan
card.text: When Stygian Leviathan enters, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Curses attached to them and you gain that much life.

card.name: Abyss Surger
card.text: Deathtouch Abyss Surger enters with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Good Night's Sleep
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Silent Hunt
card.text: Silent Hunt deals 3 damage to target creature and you gain 3 life. Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Malignant Rise
card.text: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. You draw two cards, and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Blood for Bones
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Long Forgotten
card.text: Enchant opponent At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard. If two cards that share a type are exiled this way, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Mephitic Fumes
card.text: Enchant opponent Whenever a creature enters under enchanted player's control, that creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn unless that player pays 2 life.

card.name: Suitor of the Sea
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Suitor of the Sea deals 1 damage to each player.

card.name: Smoldering Husk
card.text: When Smoldering Husk dies, it deals 2 damage to any target. {2}{R}: Smoldering Husk gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Crazed Swashbuckler
card.text: Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Crazed Swashbuckler's power is greater than its base power, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. That creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Unruly Cannoneer
card.text: Trample Whenever Unruly Cannoneer crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Admirable Admiral
card.text: Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, create a 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature token with haste.

card.name: Lava Scutterer
card.text: Menace Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, Lava Scutterer deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Pyre Apostle
card.text: Flying When Pyre Apostle enters, discard your hand, then draw three cards. Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Find Greater Purpose
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Civil Discourse
card.text: Target creature attacks or blocks this turn if able. Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Keelhaul
card.text: Target Vehicle creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Fiery Cannonade
card.text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

card.name: Expunge the Terrors
card.text: Expunge the Terrors deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker. Madness—{1}{R}, Exile X cards from your graveyard. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Breakneck Barque
card.text: Whenever Breakneck Barque becomes blocked by a creature, Breakneck Barque deals 3 damage to that creature. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.text: {1}{G}: Keen Seafarer voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.) Whenever Keen Seafarer phases in, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Rootshaper
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 4 minus that creature's power.

card.name: Crackling Agama
card.text: Resolute — Whenever Crackling Agama deals combat damage to a player, if Crackling Agama's power is greater than its base power, that player sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Three Seas Cartographer
card.text: Whenever a creature you control phases in, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Verdurous Herald
card.text: {4}{G}, Discard a card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland permanent card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Knotweald Luminary
card.text: Trample Other creatures you control have trample. {5}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Skerry Serpent
card.text: Resolute — Skerry Serpent must be blocked if able as long as its power is greater than its base power.

card.name: Ligneous Enormity
card.text: You may have Ligneous Enormity assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. Madness {3}{G}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Thicket Mimicry
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Revivification
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Song of the Sea
card.text: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)

card.name: Perennial Unrest
card.text: Madness {4}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Put a trample counter on it. If this spell's madness cost was paid, all creatures able to block that creature this turn do so.

card.name: Kelp Garden
card.text: Enchant land you control When Kelp Garden enters, mill three cards. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, add one mana of any color among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Idyllic Pegasus
card.text: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Idyllic Pegasus gets +1/+0 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

card.name: Deluge Gorger
card.text: Creatures you don't control get -1/-0 as long as their controller is cursed.

card.name: Afflicted Legion
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you lose 3 life unless you sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Tender Warden
card.text: Discard a card: Tender Warden gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.

card.text: Vigilance As long as it's your turn, other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Scalawag Swagger
card.text: As long as you control exactly two creatures, those creatures get +2/+1 and have lifelink.

card.name: Captain's Companion
card.text: Flying Other Pirates you control get +1/+1. Whenever one or more other Pirates you control deal combat damage to a player, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.text: Deathtouch When Crypt Strider enters, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token for each creature card in your graveyard.
